ambient.private: Soft, evently distributed light with no specific direction.

direct.private: Focused, hard light casting sharp shadows.

diffuse.private: Soft lighting scattering evenly, reducing shadows.

backlit.private: Light source behind the subject, creating silhouettes or halos.

side-lit.private: Light from the side, emphasizing depth and texture.

top-lit.private: Overhead light, creating dramatic shadows below.

low-key.private: Predominantly dark, high contrast, moodly lighting.

chiaroscuro.private: Strong contrast between light and dark for drama.

dappled.private: Light filtered through objects (ex., leaves, curtains).

gfb.private: Diffuse, front-facing light to create an even, flattering illumination with minimal harsh shadows.
